724376f-a.title: Manhattan: West Broadway - Thomas Street
724376f-a.text:
West Broadway, at the N.E. corner of Thomas Street, as seen through
the excavation on the N.W. corner of West Broadway and Thomas Street for
the Western Union Telegraph Building.
August 2, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
724376f-a.folder: West Broadway & Thomas Street, Manhattan, NY

724377f-a.title: Manhattan: West Broadway - Thomas Street
724377f-a.text:
West Broadway, west side, north from but not including Thomas,
to and including Worth Streets.
October 10, 1927.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
